channel.title: Technology Greeley Bush Business Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Greeley Bush Business Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: friend jon
item.description: My friend Jon got an article written about him in our hometown newspaper. Check it out. He walked a long way. Wierd - there is apparently a small amount of opposition to the government having a “super database” of information against us citizens. And in a shocking move the US decides that N. Korea is not a threat after all… wtf.. heh. luckly we are registering people who are suspected terrorists.
